    Helper methods for interpolation

      Key to exclude a file from checking for unresolved interpolators

    • Method Detail

      • keysWithUnresolvedInterpolation

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> keysWithUnresolvedInterpolation(Configuration cfg)
        Checks whether configuration contains unresolved interpolations by looking for pattern to match "${...}"
        Parameters:
        cfg - Configuration to check
        Returns:
        List with keys that returned unresolved interpolators; empty list (not null) if no unresolved interpolators were found

      • containsUnresolvedInterpolation

        public static boolean containsUnresolvedInterpolation(java.lang.String cfgId,
                                                      java.lang.String key,
                                                      java.lang.String[] values)
        Checks whether string array contains unresolved interpolations by looking for pattern to match "${...}"
        Parameters:
        values - String array to check
        Returns:
        True if unresolved interpolation is found, false otherwise

      • containsUnresolvedInterpolation

        public static boolean containsUnresolvedInterpolation(java.lang.String cfgId,
                                                      java.lang.String key,
                                                      java.lang.String value)
        Checks whether string contains unresolved interpolations by looking for pattern to match "${...}"
        Parameters:
        key - Key of value, used for logging only; null disables logging
        value - String to check
        Returns:
        True if unresolved interpolation is found, false otherwise

      • checkFilesForUnresolvedInterpolars

        public static Result checkFilesForUnresolvedInterpolars(java.lang.String cfgId,
                                                        boolean skipInactiveFiles)
        Check whether files for given package contain unresolved interpolators. Files can be excluded from the test using the key "wx.config.interpolator.checkUnresolved.excludeFile"
        Parameters:
        cfgId - Package for which to perform the test
        Returns:
        whether or not files with unresolved interpolators were found
